isis.stitle: ANTILOCK BRAKES/TRACTION CONTROL: MERITOR WABCO WITH "D" VERSION ECU - REMOVE AND INSTALL

svcproc.title: SENSOR LUBE SPECIFICATION
svcproc.para: Meritor WABCO specifications call for a sensor lubricant with the following characteristics:

Lube must be mineral oil-based and contain molydisulfide. It should have excellent anti-corrosion and adhesion characteristics, and be capable of continuous function in a temperature range of -40° to 300°F (-40° to 150°C).

warning.para: To prevent serious eye injury, always wear safe eye protection when performing vehicle maintenance or service. Release all air from the air systems before you remove any components. Pressurized air can cause serious personal injury.

caution.para: Use the following procedures to avoid damage to the electrical system and ABS/ATC components.

svcproc.para: When welding on an ABS- or ABS/ATC- equipped vehicle is necessary, disconnect the power connector from the ECU.
